fi.make.brimstone.game

Class MapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.make.brimstone.game.MapController

  • public class MapController
extends Object
    Takes care of the level and the objects within it. Calls static logic update functions from the Updater -class. This class defines the game mode, other classes are more or less game mode independent.
    Author:
    make

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapController()
      Initializes the playing field.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapController

        public MapController()
        Initializes the playing field.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllObjects

        public List<MapObject> getAllObjects()
        This method is called by the GUI for drawing the game.
        Returns:
        Returns all MapObjects possessed by the MapController as a List.

      • setDirectionListener

        public void setDirectionListener(DirectionListener dl)
        It is important that this method is called before trying to use the MapController. Can't be set in the constructor, because the DirectionListener class requires a MapController class in its constructor.
        Parameters:
        dl - The DirectionListener initialized in the Game-class

      • togglePause

        public void togglePause()
        Sets the paused -state on/off.

      • isPaused

        public boolean isPaused()
        Pause state getter.
        Returns:
        Pause status

      • addEnemy

        public void addEnemy(int x,
                     int y)
        Adds an enemy in a specific location.
        Parameters:
        x - x location.
        y - y location.

      • addNCU

        public void addNCU(int x,
                   int y)
        Adds an NCU in a specific location.
        Parameters:
        x - x location.
        y - y location.

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        Player getter.
        Returns:
        Player object.

      • getEnemies

        public List<Enemy> getEnemies()
        Enemy getter.
        Returns:
        List of Enemy objects.

      • mapUpdate

        public boolean mapUpdate(long dTime)
        This method is called by the general update method possessed by the Game class. It takes care of updating the logic side of the game.
        Parameters:
        dTime - Time since last update.
        Returns:
        Returning false signals the Game class to stop looping.

      • getEnemyAmount

        public int getEnemyAmount()
        Getter for the amount of living enemies.
        Returns:
        Living Enemy objects as int.

      • getEnemiesKilled

        public int getEnemiesKilled()
        Getter for the amount of enemies the player has killed.
        Returns:
        Killed Enemy objects as int.
